  • Firebug: neutralizes nasty niffs
    "t is a full-featured error console that shows your errors in Javascript, CSS (a godsend!) and XML. Not only that, but it does full logging for XMLHttpRequest calls, so it's a powerful tool for debugging AJAX applications as well."
    (tags: webdev firefox nifty tools)
  • John Manoogian III - Code Swami - Blog Archive Firefly.net - a bit of history
    "Firefly.net rarely gets mentioned these days, but when pheezy mentioned Pandora (which i've not yet tried), my mind rolled back to 1998."
